A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
How to kill off an amazing story by 2\,5 hours of mediocre writing and the worst imaginable send offs of characters from both the old movies and the new. 
There is nothing great going on in this film apart from the openingscene.
After 20 minutes you can easily leave the theatres because everything beyond those 20 minutes will leave you filled with resentment and disgust.
I love the entire cast and their talent.
I feel sad for them to be dragged into this borefest of a  shitshow :( The cashcow's milk has gone sour. They actually achieved it :( How? Why? O.o
